text: Rahim Ullah (রহিম উল্লাহ) is a Bangladeshi politician and the incumbent Member of Parliament from Feni-3. ==Early life== Ullah was born on 1 March 1958. ==Career== Ullah was elected to Parliament from Feni-3 in 2014 Bangladesh General Election. He beat Anwarul Karim of the Jatiya Party in the election. He is the president of Bangladesh Awami League unit of Jeddah. He is a political rival of Nizam Hazari, fellow Bangladesh Awami League politician and Member of Parliament from Feni. On 7 February 2016 his motorcarade was attacked in Feni by Bangladesh Jubo League and Bangladesh Chhatra League. The attack was believed to be a fallout from his rivalry with Nizam Hazari. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:10th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Rahim Ullah
